turn.0: Hi, I'm your automated assistant. I can answer your questions about Sean Fallon (footballer).
turn.1: What was Sean Fallon's greatest accomplishment?
turn.2: His powers of persuasion were often called upon to secure the signatures of promising young players who would go on to become Celtic legends, such as David Hay, Danny McGrain, Kenny Dalglish and Packie Bonner.
turn.3: What is the most important fact in the article?
turn.4: When Jock Stein suffered a near-fatal car crash in 1975, Fallon took over as caretaker manager.
turn.5: Are there any other interesting aspects about this article?
turn.7: What was he doing in August 2012?
turn.8: Fallon unfurled the league championship flag at Celtic Park on 4 August 2012.
turn.10: He died on 18 January 2013 at the age of 90.
